author: lutter
msg: addresses: make creation from HTML UI work

author: lutter
msg: * the source fields (address/group) were generated outside the <form> tag
and hence the fields were never submitted
* the names for the port_from and port_to fields were incorrect

author: lutter
msg: * server.rb (firewalls/new_rule): raise a validation error if no source given

author: lutter
msg: * server.rb (firewalls/new_rule): the name of the firewall is in param[:id]

author: marvin
msg: Since core/Lucy/Test.cfh uses va_list arguments, stdarg.h is required.
Include it early on, within charmony.h, since Clownfish *always* allows
